website_summaries.verdict: A complete fireman set for smaller children.
pros: Large-capacity backpack with hose-attached water gun for extended play
Easy to use with adequate range
Great for games for younger children
cons: Can be a bit heavy when filled to capacity

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this negative stars if I could. This is a huge rip off. I bought two-one for each of my sons. The first time using one of these, the sprayer stopped working. The second time we used the other one, both plastic pieces broke off the straps making it unusable AND the sprayer stopped working. The dollar store wouldn’t even sell something of such low quality. It looks cute and my sons love firefighter things but if you buy this, the only thing you’ll get are tears from your kids as it breaks right after taking it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Very fun but check for leaks.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 y/o son loved this for Christmas. Until recently, he has only been able to play with it in the bath since it has been cold outside. This week he took it outside finally and we discovered the bottom nipple where the hose connects is not straight, allowing a fairly substantial leak. This won't be a huge deal during hot summer as a full water toy but unfortunately he cannot use the toy without getting wet. The return period has already closed on the purchase before we discovered the leak. Otherwise, he loves this toy and I would give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: The good news is that it has lasted
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my grandson for his birthday. He loves it. It holds a lot of water and can shoot the water a long distance. My grandson is five and he runs around the front yard with it on. He also sprays it from his ride-on battery truck. I do have to convince him not to shoot me with the water spray as five year old boys will do. The good news is that it has lasted. He doesn't play easy, so that says a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Junk....
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed.... ordered this gift for a 3yr old bday and reviews seemed really good, well we filled out up and where the hose screws to the water tank out seems stripped and leaks real bad. For what i paid i expected better quality, and i ordered it early so now i cant even return it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ambr Kapp

customer_reviews.title: Overall cute and fun.
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute and my little boy loves the hat. Overall, this is a good enough buy. My 3 year old had a hard time with the water gun though. It’s somewhat hard to spray and the backpack slides off his shoulders constantly. I think for a little older child it would be fine however.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: My son's favorite summer toy!
customer_reviews.text: My three year old absolutely loves this. It holds a decent amount of water, we don't even fill it all the way up anyways though because it's too heavy for him to carry on his back. Straps have held up great so far. I read a lot of reviews there were leaking problems. It leaks a tiny bit but only if held upside down. Personally I feel that because it's a water gun, expect some things to get wet and don't sweat over a tiny leak. This backpack is really a cute and fun toy. If you have a kid who loves firefighters like mine, he will love this toy too.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron and Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Fun Pretend gear for Summer!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It was a hit before his Dad could get it out of the package! He played with it all afternoon. This was a wonderful birthday present. The only thing I could think of to make it better would be a loop or "holster" for the sprayer when not actually using it. Seemed durable enough for kid wear & tear. Glad I got it for him!.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sweet squirt gun!
customer_reviews.text: One of my son's friends had a Paw Patrol water gun that was a very similar style. This one has a larger tank capacity and the gun itself is cooler. The helmet is a great upgrade from the his old. It really completes his whole fireman costume. My only complaint is that the stickers do not want to stay on the tank at all. Doesn't seem like a huge deal in relation to how much my three-year-old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Save your $$
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my boys (one from this seller and one from another) and both were terrible. They leak everywhere. Within a week they stopped spraying all together. There were kinks in the hose lines that prevented the water from squirting which was extremely frustrating during the short period of time they actually worked. Cute concept but poorly made. Huge waste of money. I'd swear clear of any of these red firemen type backpacks.
customer_reviews.author: amymichb24

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity, fun for all
customer_reviews.text: This water gun is perfect for 3-5 year olds who want to be firemen. My boys have hours of fun every time we pull this out. The capacity of the pack is nice and large (it’s pretty heavy too) and allows the kids not to be asking me to fill it up every 5 minutes. It takes a good 15 minutes until they run out of water.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Firefighter lovers dream
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my fireman loving 3.5 year old and has not put it down since receiving. I am hoping this stays an inside pretend toy and I don’t have to deal with the water aspect just yet haha! I cannot speak to how the water functionality works. My son loves to play with it!
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Kids love being fireman
customer_reviews.text: Ok so first the thing that's soo lovable about it is that it's very easy to use for a 4yr old. Most of the nerf guns or water guns for sale are difficult for a young kid to operate. Then u add a backpack holder to it and u know every 5 min your going to get asked to do something to it. This is so easy they dont need you...yes u might get shot a few times but that's it! The biggest seller for me was they are a fireman come on what kid doesnt want to be a fireman!!! The gun part even looks like how they put out fires...which makes it even cooler for kids
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Also the spray is pretty weak so it only goes a little ways
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok squirt gun especially if you have a "little firefighter" at home, but it only lasted a couple months before breaking and is too big and heavy for your kiddo to refill on his own. Also the spray is pretty weak so it only goes a little ways. This will not work in a water fight.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: Long range and hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: My boy does love this one. Very easy to use. It does get a bit heavy once you fill it with water but it’s worth it. My boy is only three so gets tired of the back bag really quickly. His older friends can go on and on with it for hours. Works great for small and big kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Lioness

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVES this, GREAT purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot keep my son out of this. This is a well designed and well made fire fighter toy. The gun shoots out water and the containers hold enough water to be fun but not too much to make it too heavy to carry. The fire hat is also very well made, high quality compared to others out there. Super fun, super durable long lasting toy.
customer_reviews.author: Hanne Leon

customer_reviews.title: Good water cannon
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about the fire hose/water cannon It was easy to use for my two-year-old And (3) year old The wall even last a long time my only problem is the attachment hose It has gotten hard and seem to be made out of cheap plastic I taped up the holes with duct tape just sold the water guns or water cans class throughout the summer if I had a choice I will buy again ,hopefully that your production company get a better quality of plastic rubber etc the will allow the water cannon to be more flexible tangle free Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Sweet

customer_reviews.title: My four year old loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go with my sons Halloween costume he loves it and it makes his costume look even better
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie b.

customer_reviews.title: Leaky product. Not good.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived and once we put water in it, the leaks started. It leaked from the gun and screw points on the water tank. The gun itself didn't have a good seal, so it couldn't really spray the water much. Overall not a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Hyun Jin O

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My three year old son loves pretending to be a fireman. We got this for him for his birthday in January. It's meant for outdoor fun, but he plays with it in the bathtub. It's surprisingly well built for a water gun and easy for him to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old got it for his 4rh birthday and absolutely loves it. Some reviews say it leaks but it does NOT. There is a small hole at the top of the lid that allows the pressure to work to spray the hose. Some people must be having their children where the back pack incorrectly. If your child wears the water tank the right way, it won't leak. I don't have to fill the tank very often. This is a Greta buy
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: My 2 grandsons loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 grandsons had a blast with this. They wouldn't take off their fire hats all afternoon. I had to refill many times but only because they wanted to water everything in sight. It has a pretty large capacity to hold the water but these boys just couldn't stop. This was a great purchase for water fun.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought five for grandkids. They had a blast at the beach house. I don't recommend getting sand into them; the kids put out shaving cream fires all around the house while parents got a break. One arrived with a leak and was replaced at no cost. Great toy!
customer_reviews.author: dotleo

customer_reviews.title: Super fun
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old LOVED this for his birthday! We ended up buying a second because the fights over it with the 3 yr old brother just weren’t worth it. Totally awesome for kids who love playing fireman and love water!
customer_reviews.author: Erin R

customer_reviews.title: BE AWARE!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money..I bought this for my son's birthday he was excited as I brought it home after party I noticed it was missing pieces. The most important pieces! The yellow piece to keep the water secure! My son was extremely excited only to be quickly disappointed!!! The hose was even crushed!! Save your money do NOT buy this toy. It's a complete rip off!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... Paw Patrol fan adores this- he thinks he's just like Marshall when he plays with it- he's too little ...
customer_reviews.text: My two year old Paw Patrol fan adores this- he thinks he's just like Marshall when he plays with it- he's too little to realize it's not related to his favorite cartoon at all! Paw Patrol, he's on a roll!!! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Guera Medina

customer_reviews.title: Big hit!
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit for a birthday present. Easy enough for a 3 year old but also loved by the 8-9 year olds. The little yellow handle kept falling off, but it's not necessary for using the water gun, so we aren't too worried about it.
customer_reviews.author: ART110

customer_reviews.title: Big hit!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old nephew for his Birthday and he couldn’t love it more! Big hit! All the kids wanted to play with it, so it’s unique in that you can’t just find it anywhere. It is a bit on the heavy side when filled with water, but it didn’t/doesn’t bother him at all! It is best used with swimwear, because it has a small slow leak where the hose attaches on the bottom. Again, not an issue if it’s outside or with a swimsuit. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: J. Herian-Phat

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a month with multiple uses and an attempt to put out a real fire (camp fire) it's now somewhere under the porch and I'm 99% sure it's still working.
customer_reviews.author: thomas wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect accessories for Marshall costume; kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I paired this Fireman set with a white thermal base set which I colored black spots all over to create a Marshall costume for my son. I never intend to put water in the tank and let him shoot this, because that seems insane to me. Lol, but he is none the wiser. He and his little sister are obsessed with it.
customer_reviews.author: LivingTheDream

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for kids for safe outdoor play
customer_reviews.text: Great service by seller. Product is well-made and our 2 yr old who received it loves it. His 4 yr old cousin and 5 yr ild sister love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Alan R. Golkin

customer_reviews.title: Piece of kid in tears when it breaks with minute!I still request a refund
customer_reviews.text: Broke within minutes of use handle fell off hose and Jose broke from back pack!!! Have been asking for a refund for some time!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Larabel

customer_reviews.title: Gift for nephew
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my nephew he is really into emergency response. The pack which is supposed to double as a squirt gun does not work. Maybe I just received a bad one, but it will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!! Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely LOVE the backpack! Holds a lot of water too. I love the look of the hat. Better appearance then others out there. Great customer service is needed too! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tara W

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: 3 weeks into heavy use still holding up, no leaks. My three and a half year old absolutely loves it but now he has to to fight his baby sister for it!!
customer_reviews.author: RickyG

customer_reviews.title: Boys Fireman Backpack Water Shooter Toy
customer_reviews.text: Super cute fireman backpack water shooter toy! Grandson loves it! Excellent seller & quick delivery! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Connie S Burkett

customer_reviews.title: ... and it doesn’t shoot very far but he did love it. It made it so much easier for ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephew it does leak water and it doesn’t shoot very far but he did love it. It made it so much easier for him to play with the bigger kids in a water fight. The water leaking is minimal and if you are already planning on getting wet what’s the big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The water leaks everywhere from the back back. There's little holes everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tyra T. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy and squirt gun!
customer_reviews.text: My 4-year old loves this water gun. Even without water in it, it's fun to put on his back and feel like a fireman. It holds a lot of water and it's not difficult for him to pump the yellow handle to squirt out water.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Feldman

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If your grandchildren love playing fireman or loves playing with water and squirt guns, this is the toy to get! Keeps them busy and having fun for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: suzyQ

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: This toy is of good quality, my son likes it very much, but it has a little taste.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Total dud
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t hold up for the afternoon.. Disappointed kids..go with the old reliable squirt gun.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: China made
customer_reviews.text: Hose came totally bent, I can't get the kink out so the water does not flow through it.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Smith

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves it !
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. Durable and my grandson loves it ! Just fill the canisters and he puts out imaginary fires outside.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Bass

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Prodictbstarted to leak shortly after getting it. Wasn’t happy with product and felt it was to cheep.
customer_reviews.author: Harbikramjit Kang

customer_reviews.title: Great product but I am afraid the pipe will broke ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product but I am afraid the pipe will broke soon. Hope to be able to replace 😳 And I had to glue the patch on the helmet! Before they had just sticker so it is nicer but when the helmet fall on the floor it falls :(
customer_reviews.author: Noname

customer_reviews.title: This is by far my son’s favorite birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my son’s favorite birthday gift. I’d give it 5 stars but it leaks and slowly soaks his pants. He loves it so much he says he doesn’t care. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kate Helfer

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: My son and nephew are both obsessed about fire fighters so I got a set for them both. Its bigger than I imagined and looks super fun. It's a Christmas gift so I'll have to update my review if it does not work probably
customer_reviews.author: Unique

customer_reviews.title: Fireman favoriate
customer_reviews.text: I don't have experience myself with this but my grandson who received it sent a video of him squirting many feet ahead with steady stream of water.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as it’s described. I haven’t shown my three year old the water option yet, but he enjoys strapping it on and pretending to fight fires. It also fits my 12 year old lol who plays pretend with my youngest. Great product, perfect price, shipped quickly, and most of all kid approved.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Fireman Dress Up!
customer_reviews.text: Got it because of the water tank. We didn't need the hat (we have too many already). The tank is made of durable plastic and our son (7yr) loves that he can wear the tank like if it was backpack and he can shoot water. The hat was better than I thought it would be. Nice piece of thick plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Gourmet Cook

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: My kid absolutely loves this as well as all the neighborhood kids. It was a big hit. It did come with a small hole on the water tank so water does leak if we fill it up all the way. We just fill it up below the hole and use it that way. 4 stars just bc of the hole. If that had not been there, I definitely would have rated 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it but the Backpack part came dented but we need it got a Sketch so I did not have time to return it
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Sleater

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Defective
customer_reviews.text: Leaks! The top nozzle doesn't fit securely. It leaked on our first try and could only be fixed with duct tape (that will have to come off when it needs to be refilled, then reapplied). My son saved his own money to purchase this. He was incredibly disappointed. ***I'm editing my review because the seller contacted me and offered to send a replacement and/or refund my money.***
customer_reviews.author: eddy

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is not a high end item but the kid loves it.
customer_reviews.author: G&MW

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my friend's 5 years old boy, put a big smile on his face
customer_reviews.text: It is a birthday gift. If you kids are into fireman cartoon, paw patrol. Go buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Aiguo Zeng

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for young boy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Bought for a nephew as a birthday present and all 3 nephews were fighting over it, they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: xtal455

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loved it !
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 year old nephew and he absolutely loved it. No small parts so it’s safe and not too heavy. Since we can’t take him to parks and we are looking for ways to entertain him at home this was perfect for him to play in the yard . Best money spent he is soo happy with it !
customer_reviews.author: silviux

customer_reviews.title: Was as described. For my Grandson's Easter Basket, ...
customer_reviews.text: Was as described. For my Grandson's Easter Basket, from the Easter Bunny!
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE SILVERMAN

customer_reviews.title: This works unlike others
customer_reviews.text: We first bought the paw Patrol water pack and had to return bc it leaked- was skeptical of this one but glad we took the chance. This is great quality not cheap thin plastic- it’ll last the entire summer and more! The hats better than our other fireman hats too
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my son's 3rd birthday and the only thing that made him unhappy was when we took it away from him so we could make him eat something. He loves it. It's fantastic and awesome
customer_reviews.author: Steven Law

customer_reviews.title: Fun product, but leaks substantially.
customer_reviews.text: My four-year-old nephew loved this product, but unfortunately, it leaks pretty substantially where the hose screws onto the tank. Not sure if it was a defect in the product I received or if all of them leak. To be safe, I would expect your child's clothes and your floor to get pretty wet when using it.
customer_reviews.author: Alyse

customer_reviews.title: Cute concept for a fun summertime water toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson's 4th birthday, along with a fire hydrant sprinkler. He absolutely LOVES it! Cute concept for a fun summertime water toy! The only suggestion I'd make is to add info on how the gun slides back to eject the water, as it took a little time for me to figure this out.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Broke the third day. Pretty flimsy plastic. Tried turn unit over. Crack at other end changed water flow.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Hat is great but Backpack leaks.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old grand son love this backpack water gun and hat. The hat is well made but the backpack water gun leaks out of the bottom of the tank. I think I can fix this but I haven't as yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Martin

customer_reviews.title: They both loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for birthday presents (5 and 4 year olds). They both loved it!!! Quality seems good and water gun works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: musicgal

customer_reviews.title: The littles love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one as a gift for my nephew and when my 5 year old saw it, he had to have one too! So I bought another. The boys love them! Great value! This shoots water a lot further than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: This is junk. This had bad reviews but my son really wanted it. Water falls right out the bottom. Believe the reviews this is junk.
customer_reviews.author: emily singley

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my little guy who desperately wants to keep up with his big brother but can’t quite maneuver the big boy guns. Plus he is a fireman, which is his dream.
customer_reviews.author: JLReimer

customer_reviews.title: Camw cracked
customer_reviews.text: Toddler loved it but noticed it came cracked upon arrival. It was rough to get it back from him so didn't risk getting a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Xaxaking

customer_reviews.title: Big hit!
customer_reviews.text: My four year old nephew loves water toys and this is officially his fave! They have a block party on the horizon and he's very excited to wear this to show off to the Firemen.
customer_reviews.author: Suzu

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: Was good for the first 20min my 4yr old daughter used it. Then, the two plastic rings inside that hold the pump in the tube broke allowing the pump to pull out and not allow it to squirt water. For the money you’d expect better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Grant

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers love this, but for my 2 and 5 year old grandsons it was just ok.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Its fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is 4 and he enjoys it but he says it's to heavy and hurts his arms. Maybe you could cushion the straps somehow
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Fun summer fun!
customer_reviews.text: A great birthday gift for a neighbor child Who immediately wanted to play with it. A great toy
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Good as a costume prop, but the gun leaks all over the place on just the first try
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: My son first loved it, then not so much
customer_reviews.text: Fun, but it's way too heavy for my 3 year old when filled w water; he also could not pump it to make the gun shoot. I had to carry and pump it for him. He ended up just dragging it in water. Would not recommend if less than 5 years old. No mention of a minimum age on description.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Mizani

customer_reviews.title: Everything
customer_reviews.text: I love to see my grandkid playing as a fireman he was so happy my little granddaughter ask for one i buy two and i am so glad i did it i recomend this product is exelent
customer_reviews.author: Julio Jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: My Son Loves It
customer_reviews.text: We bought this toy for our son and he really loves it. It’s very cute. The neighborhood kids all want to take turns playing with it too.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger714

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS CRAP.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. The first time using it one of the straps broke literly in half. The other strap won't stay at the size you put it at. After 3 times using this product the tube has came off and will not go back on.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 3 and 5 year old really enjoyed these but after not too many water began to ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3 and 5 year old really enjoyed these but after not too many water began to leak out where the hose inserts into the backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Walker

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it holds lots of water
customer_reviews.text: It is a gift for a July birthday so can't give it an honest review until then.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Brought these to a BBQ and the kids had a blast. No issues with leaking, just fun and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Twardzik

customer_reviews.title: Water leaks out all over you
customer_reviews.text: This product is cool but doesn’t work. It leaks water all over the place when you try to put water in the tank.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great water gun
customer_reviews.text: Cute little water gun pack for my future firefighter nephew! I couldn’t get it out of the package fast enough and he was ready to squirt everyone. Holds a decent amount of water so refilling isn’t as often as other water guns.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Great water gun!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun little water gun. My little boy is in heaven. We did have a little trouble with the nozzle shortly after we got it, but I contacted the company and they sent a replacement out right away. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Will not last.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a 3 year old's birthday. Used about 3-4 times then the hose quit working and will not let the water come out.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: This set feels sturdy, and it functions well. This will be a gift for my nephew, and I tested it out to make sure that if anyone was going to be disappointed it would be me rather than him. Time will tell if it holds up to a young boy's use.
customer_reviews.author: P. Kutschke

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it, it looks cheap though. Have not put water in it yet though
customer_reviews.author: Erica V.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy for a smaller kids to wear
customer_reviews.text: The child I bought this for loves it. But it started leaking after 45 minutes of play time.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Cute Product
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this! We haven't used water in it yet as it is cold outside.
customer_reviews.author: dlc

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 years old's Halloween costume and it's so great he's using it still dressing up around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Made my nephew smile
customer_reviews.text: My nephew ran around smiling and laughing while he squirted everyone he could with the water gun. Big tank lasted a long time for him. Would have given 5 stars, but the stitching on one of the shoulder straps came undo. Wasn't a big deal, we just tied it in a knot.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Telesz

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: We havent used it yet as it is a birthday present for my soon to be 7 year old. But it looks and feels like this is going to be a good toy and he is going to love it. Will mom love getting squirted? We will find out!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Taillefer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephews 5th birthday and I heard it was a hit! They sent me some photos and it looked like fun. My 9 year old daughter had a twinge of jealousy when she saw.. hahaha. The hat is a nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: Sookie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Haven’t opened it to use yet due to it being a Christmas presant for a nephew, but it looks perfect! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing toy!
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing!My son loves it and thinks he is a real fighter when he uses his fire extinguisher:)
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Dislike the product
customer_reviews.text: It takes alot of muscle to shoot out the water & it is not durable. would not recommend it. Bad design.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Le

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap product...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few weeks ago for my sons upcomin bday...he was all excited to try it today after he got it but unfortunately it’s leaking from all sides and not even usable
customer_reviews.author: Chana Green

customer_reviews.title: Great for costume
customer_reviews.text: This will help make a fun adult firefighter Halloween costume-We plan to use the backpack as a beverage dispenser.....
customer_reviews.author: Bob H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Easy for the kids to fill up and use by themselves and it doesn't leak.
customer_reviews.author: Jackiet

product_meta.title: Prextex Fireman Backpack Water Shooter and Blaster with Fire Hat- Water Gun Beach Toy and Outdoor Sports Toy
feature_bullets: Prextex Fireman Backpack Water Gun Blaster is Great for Kids on A Hot Summer Day!
Fill Tank Once and Enjoy Plenty of Spraying Without Having to Refill Tank Over and Over Again!
Includes: 1 Fireman Backpack Water Gun and 1 Plastic Fire Hat.
Great for Bath time Fun, Beach fun, Pool Fun or for Any Which Outdoor Summer Activity!
Water shooting distance up to 9 Meters!
